nodes.documentation: @notice Indicates a contract is the `implementer` of `interfaceHash` for `account`.
nodes.name: InterfaceImplementerSet

nodes.documentation: @notice Indicates `newManager` is the address of the new manager for `account`.
nodes.name: ManagerChanged
IERC1820Registry
setInterfaceImplementer
setManager
updateERC165Cache
getManager
getInterfaceImplementer
implementsERC165Interface
implementsERC165InterfaceNoCache
interfaceHash

nodes.documentation: @notice Indicates a contract is the `implementer` of `interfaceHash` for `account`.
nodes.name: InterfaceImplementerSet

nodes.documentation: @notice Indicates `newManager` is the address of the new manager for `account`.
nodes.name: ManagerChanged

params.account: Address being queried for the implementer of an interface. (If 'account' is the zero address then 'msg.sender' is assumed.)
params.interfaceHash: Keccak256 hash of the name of the interface as a string. E.g., 'web3.utils.keccak256("ERC777TokensRecipient")' for the 'ERC777TokensRecipient' interface.

getInterfaceImplementer(address,bytes32).return: The address of the contract which implements the interface `interfaceHash` for `account.address()` or '0' if `account.address()` did not register an implementer for this interface.

params.account: Address for which to return the manager.

getManager(address).return: Address of the manager for a given address.

params.account: Address of the contract to check.
Address of the contract to check.

interfaceHash(string).return: The keccak256 hash of an interface name.

params.account: Address for which to set the interface. (If 'account' is the zero address then 'msg.sender' is assumed.)
params.interfaceHash: Keccak256 hash of the name of the interface as a string. E.g., 'web3.utils.keccak256("ERC777TokensRecipient")' for the 'ERC777TokensRecipient' interface.

params.account: Address for which to set the new manager.
params.newManager: Address of the new manager for `addr.address()`. (Pass '0x0' to reset the manager to `account.address()`.)

params.account: Address of the contract for which to update the cache.
params.interfaceId: ERC165 interface for which to update the cache.

getInterfaceImplementer(address,bytes32).notice: Query if an address implements an interface and through which contract.

getManager(address).notice: Get the manager of an address.

implementsERC165Interface(address,bytes4.notice: Checks whether a contract implements an ERC165 interface or not. If the result is not cached a direct lookup on the contract address is performed. If the result is not cached or the cached value is out-of-date, the cache MUST be updated manually by calling 'updateERC165Cache' with the contract address.

implementsERC165InterfaceNoCache(address.notice: Checks whether a contract implements an ERC165 interface or not without using nor updating the cache.

interfaceHash(string).notice: Compute the keccak256 hash of an interface given its name.

setInterfaceImplementer(address,bytes32,.notice: Sets the contract which implements a specific interface for an address. Only the manager defined for that address can set it. (Each address is the manager for itself until it sets a new manager.)

setManager(address,address).notice: Sets `newManager.address()` as manager for `account.address()`. The new manager will be able to call 'setInterfaceImplementer' for `account.address()`.

updateERC165Cache(address,bytes4).notice: Updates the cache with whether the contract implements an ERC165 interface or not.
